short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Discover your friends' YouTube world. Get to know them through ViZBL.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ever wondered what your friends watch on YouTube? Well, the ViZBL Extension allows you to share that! 
 
With ViZBL, you can easily integrate social interactions into your YouTube experience, making it more engaging than ever before.
